title: Digital World: Video Compression
addDirTip: Will find all video files in the selected folder and subfolders
taskThreadsNumberTip: The larger the number of task threads, the more CUP and memory it consumes. It is recommended to choose 1-3 for regular computers
crfTip: The higher the value, the worse the video quality and the higher the compression rate
bitRateTip1: The larger the bit rate, the larger the video volume
bitRateTip2: If the original bit rate of the video is less than the set bit rate, the original bit rate of the video will be used
bitRateTip4: Bit rate must be an integer
frameRateTip1: Numbers ranging from 10 to 60, with larger frame rates and larger video volume
frameRateTip11: If the original frame rate of the video is less than the set frame rate, the original frame rate of the video will be used
frameRateTip3: Must be a number from 10 to 60 (up to 2 decimal places)
resolutionTip1: When not set, the original resolution of the video will be maintained.
resolutionTip2: If the original width and height of the video are less than the set width and height, the original resolution of the video will be used.
resolutionTip3: If the original width and height of the video are greater than the set width and height, the video will be proportionally reduced.
delConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete it?
